title: Lazy Nezumi Pro v15.8.4.1622 Cracked [deepstatus]
description:
Lazy Nezumi Pro v15.8.4.1622

Take control of your lines!

Lazy Nezumi Pro is a Windows app that helps you draw smooth,
beautiful lines, with your mouse or pen tablet.

It works with many of your favorite art programs,
including Photoshop, Illustrator, and Flash.

Why do I need it?

Clean line-art taking forever?
Forced to make fast strokes to avoid seeing any jitters?
Pressing really hard to use the full pressure range of your tablet?
Uneven pressure in your strokes?
Art software leaving ugly artifacts at the end of your lines?
Hand shaking when you draw?
App cursor getting in the way when drawing details?
Switching software in the middle of your work because your main art
program doesn't support input smoothing?

If any of this sounds familiar,
you will love Lazy Nezumi Pro!


Lazy Nezumi Pro has been tested to run with most versions
of Photoshop with plugin support.
It also works with many other art apps using
the Hook Window method.
This includes Flash, Illustrator, MS Paint, Krita, Gimp,
TwistedBrush, ZBrush, 3D-Coat, Sculptris, Paint Tool SAI,
MyPaint, Paint.NET, Open Canvas, ArtRage, Sketchbook,
Inkscape, Mari, Manga Studio, Sketchup, Toon Boom, TVPaint,
etc...


Lazy Nezumi Pro has been tested to run on
the following versions of Windows:

Windows XP
Windows Vista
Windows 7
Windows 8/8.1
Windows 10 - Currently testing. Seems OK so far.

The minimum hardware specs are:

25MB disk space, 1.0GHz CPU, 1GB RAM.



INSTALLATION


Install LazyNezumiPro_Setup.exe.
Do not launch Lazy Nezumi Pro yet.
Next extract crack.rar to install directory
CProgram Files (x86)Lazy Nezumi Pro
Lazy Nezumi Pro is
now fully registered and activated!
